description:
Remade the entire tab(borrowing from the old one) on Guitar Pro. 
-Remastered from scratch the drums to be completely accurate to the song
-Made some drastic (and non) riff changes(mostly alternative fingering)based on countless reviewed live footage from the band.
-Divided the tab in sections, combined some tracks for simplicity.
I swear i didn't touch the solo and the basslines!
title: The Leper Affinity

title: The Leper Affinity

description:
- Fixed the fingering on both Lindgren's and Akerfeldt's solos.
- Changed the ending riff so its just one guitar playing (according to live videos and audio from the remix)
- I had a look over the drum parts at the places Lem mentioned, but they seem to be fine to me. I'll leave the reports in just in case I missed something, however.
title: The Leper Affinity
